channel.title: Character File
channel.description:
Hey! I just have a quick question -
How do I change the value of things in my character file on creation?
Like when a guy named Bob creates and account, in his character file, character-ancients is already set to 1, 0 being default.
How would I do that?
Thanks in advance, Skullator!

item.title: Character File
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Yes, but that’s just an example, I actually want all the quests to be done(q10 = 15, not = 0)

I’m using DeltaScape source…

Read full topic

item.title: Character File
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

are you saying when he logs in he already has ancients and no normal magics?

Read full topic
